Name: Locked In VR
About the game: Locked In VR is an escape room type experience. The player must use his wits and senses to find his way out of the basement and uncover the terrible truth about his imprisonment. The player can move around in roomscale setting and use teleport to explore the area. The time is running up - the player must get out of the basement before whoever locked him in returns.
Meta Title: Locked In VR: Dec 1, 2016, Immersion and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Locked In VR? Check out the release date (Dec 1, 2016), developer insights from Immersion, and a complete game summary.
